channel.title: Please just answer!
channel.description: I recently found out that my linksys wireless router version had some port forwarding bugs, so i downloaded the firmwork update that will fix it, but i don't know how to open it or run it whatever i do with it, so can someone please help me? sorry for the multi post, but it seems once a post is off this page it is never read again, and my last one is off the page

item.title: Please just answer!
